meanings.definition: Used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal previously mentioned or easily identified.
meanings.sent2: He can tie his shoes himself.
meanings.sent3: The dog groomed himself with a wagging tail.
meanings.sent5: The man painted the house himself, showing great skill.

meanings.definition: Used to emphasize that a particular person did something without help.
meanings.sent3: The child proudly declared, 'I did it all by myself!'
meanings.sent4: The athlete pushed himself to the limit during the race.
meanings.sent5: The student challenged himself to learn a new language.
